product_name: Shimano SLX RD-M675 SGS 10-Speed Rear Derailleur
long_description: Boasting a low-profile, chain-slap-reducing design, the Shimano SLX RD-M675 SGS 10-speed rear derailleur delivers clean, crisp shifting for your trail riding sorties. Shadow Plus derailleur stays close to the cassette, helping to keep the derailleur out of harm's way on rough trails. Clutch mechanism helps stabilize the derailleur, reducing chain slap and delivering consistent shifting, no matter how rough the terrain gets. Wide pivot design increases rigidity to deliver crisp, precise shifts. Long cage length is compatible with up to a 36T rear cassette sprocket; a minimum 32T rear cassette sprocket is necessary for proper derailleur function. Shimano SLX RD-M675 SGS 10-speed rear derailleur is part of the Dyna-Sys group of components from Shimano and is compatible with other Dyna-Sys parts. Designed for optimal use with HG-X 10-speed drivetrains; direct cable routing enhances shifting response.
short_description: Boasting a low-profile, chain-slap-reducing design, the Shimano SLX RD-M675 SGS 10-speed rear derailleur delivers clean, crisp shifting for your trail riding sorties.
